title: Council Reckoning Unleashed
outcome: Following resource surpluses and rising influence of self-governing free zones, the Council fractures. Factions begin public confessionals, revealing hidden abuses and system secrets to win legitimacy, escalating civic division and opening a wave of whistleblowing.

events.description: Council factions launch televised confessionals, exposing internal abuses of the BCI and blaming each other for its failings. Civic anger intensifies as new information emerges.

Whistleblowers from within the Council release documents confirming BCI-related disappearances and compliance manipulation during Halden's secret pilot programs. Protests against past Council crimes erupt across the city.

Council members attempt to hold a reconciliation assembly but are drowned out by survivor accounts and renewed demands for justice. Calls for entirely new forms of governance rise throughout the free zones.
Free zone leaders unite, forming citywide committees to investigate historical BCI abuses and propose a permanent public-led system to replace the Council.
